items.summary: Dreaming of a soft, romantic wedding theme? This blush pink and ivory…
items.content_html:
Dreaming of a soft, romantic wedding theme? This blush pink and ivory wedding inspiration board features modern satin bridesmaid dresses, neutral-toned cascading florals, elegant reception decor, a timeless applique bridal gown, and delicate touches like velvet ring boxes and minimal signage. Itâ€™s the perfect pastel wedding color palette for spring, summer, or timeless year-round weddings. Ideal for brides planning a chic and elevated celebration.
